Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Before we proceed, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase this product, you can do so at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is a limited-time offer designed to recognize your early interest and commitment to innovation in your field. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or if you wish to secure this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
